title: Automated de-duplication of systematic searches
text: Removing duplicate references obtained different databases essential step conducting updating systematic literature reviews. ASySD (pronounced “assist”) tool automatically identify remove duplicate records. tool available R package user-friendly shiny application.

title: Automated de-duplication of systematic searches
text: evaluation ASySD’s performance versus automated deduplication tools available preprint

Automated de-duplication of systematic searches
code: # load citations  citation_data <- load_search(filepath, method="endnote")  # deduplicate dedup_citations <- dedup_citations(citation_data)  # get unique citation dataframe unique_citations <- dedup_citations$unique
